name: TEK the lost cat in the pyramid BETA VERSION
name_original: TEK the lost cat in the pyramid BETA VERSION
description:
Control :

Q : Jump

Arrow key : Move Tek

_______________________________________

Tek is a platform game made in 2016 for the mini ludumDare70, the theme was Determinism. The character is a old Oc from 2004. I try to rework on this old gamejam projet and add better animations, recode better collision etc...
